post.body: No way!! Nothing on Queen Anne yet - but it's likely headed our way!
Go get 'em Derek!
So how was the Portland seminar - ONE MONTH AGO!! C'mon girl - Twitter already!! ;)
The BYFAB is brilliant! Can't wait to try it!
Trying to get thru my Tivo'd shows b4 move to LA nxt wk. Good way to sit on couch do chnge address forms & tell myself I'm being productive.
Happy New Year everyone! Here's to a remarkably positive 2009 - in the words of Bob Marley - "everything's gonna be alright"...
Just had "beef wellington" made w/out beef & was totally vegan. Wow! I think I'm in pre-training for my new SoCal life! It was awesome!
Working out details for my move to LA next week. Tons to cram into 8 days! What's the best workout in BevHills area? Need insider tips!
Merry Christmas and happy holidays to everyone!
Really busy as we skid into holiday.Hopeful all are finding glimpses of prosperity/momentum despite devastating developments these last mo's
Cannot believe how expensive tire chains are for a Volvo! Re-thinking having the Pug be the main reason to drive instead of fly to L.A....
Great to see co's -even mid-Dec & during major economic crisis-still see hi quality/intelligent/creative PR/mktg as key to competitive edge.
So snowy on top of Queen Anne hill/Seattle! Next month at this time odds of duplicating this scene will be unlikely. Does it snow in SoCal?
Headed out to a candlelight ceremony for Christmas. Might be nice to just take a break for an hour. And I look better in candlelight anyway!
Wonderful and thoughtful list of holiday ideas for those in assisted living: http://tinyurl.com/6xxk5n from http://www.snapforseniors.com/
Literally can see layers of weather out my home office window. Looks like sun, snow and rain are all on their way!
Love having my daughter home for the holidays - now it feels like Christmas is coming!
Would love suggestions on safe/low cost air travel for my Pug.Need to get him to LA fr SEA in early Jan & airline won't take him (20+lbs).
Would love suggestions on safe air travel for my Pug.Need to get him to L.A. fr Seattle in early Jan. and airline won't take him (20+lbs).
Glad snowed in today. Will research new biz opps: who's got gameplan/budget/intelligence to capitalize on mktg/PR opp's in this biz climate?
